thread.title: Wonderful citybreak
thread.title_full: Wonderful citybreak - Review of The Chess Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: joandrew o
title: Wonderful citybreak
text:
Great central location, 3 minutes walk from the lovely La Fayette shopping galleries. A really super boutique hotel with great showers & helpful staff. Loved the free 4g phone in the room with pre-loaded tourist apps. Booked with Secret Escapes, who never disappoint with the great hotel's they choose to have on their portfolio. Thanks for a great stay!
Room Tip: Rooms on any A level are front facing. See more room tips
